fieldDef.name: outsideMember
fieldDef.title: Does the committee contain an outside member?

fieldDef.name: approvedByate
fieldDef.title: Officially approved by on this date:

td.font: Your Change of Research Committee Form has been submitted for review and approval. Refer to the student reference guide on the University Graduate School page in OneStart to learn to track your document. You may now close this window.

Approver for First Major listed - Please complete the following items:
-If a new member is being added, indicate whether or not they are endorsed in the "Committee Members" section.
-If there are outside committee members being added, make sure to mark them as "Approved" in the "Committee Members Outside of University..." section.

font.b: Change of Research Committee for the Ph.D.

td.br: Enter a dot if no middle name
Enter a dot if no middle name

font.b: Committee Members Outside of University, or Those Not Able to be Listed Above

td.font: Attach a CV for each outside committee member.**
(By clicking approve, you are proxy approving for them.)

Documents should be attached to a note in the "Create Note" section at the bottom of this form.
Click the "browse" button to search for your document, after you've selected it, click the "save" button that is to the right of the note. A new "note" box will pull in after saving. There can only be one attachment per note, but you can create multiple notes.

font.b: For University Graduate School Use Only

b.font: This form is being refreshed. Please wait.
